results.title: Clinical electrophysiological effects of atenolol--a new cardioselective beta-blocking agent.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@, a cardioselective beta-blocking agent, at dose levels of 0.03, 0.06, and 0.12 mg/kg intravenously, produced @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@prolongation of atrioventricular nodal conduction@@@ in 22 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with suspected @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Robinson C, Birkhead J, Crook B, Jennings K, Jewitt D. Clinical electrophysiological effects of atenolol--a new cardioselective beta-blocking agent. Br Heart J. 1978 Jan;40(1):14-21. PMID: 341927

results.title: Effects of betaxolol on cardiohemodynamics and coronary circulation in anesthetized dogs: comparison with atenolol and propranolol.
results.text_hl: Prolongation of @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@AVCT@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ was stronger than those with @CHEMICAL_Betaxolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015784 @@@betaxolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

results.title: Atrial tachycardia with 1:1 atrioventricular conduction precipitated by propafenone.
results.text_hl: The ECG showed 1:1 @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@atrioventricular conduction@@@ (AV) of the @DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@atrial tachycardia@@@ which promptly improved after administering intravenous @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

results.title: Electrocardiographic changes in HIV-infected, drug-experienced patients being treated with atazanavir.
results.text_hl: New asymptomatic @DISEASE_Bundle_Branch_Block @DISEASE_MESH:D002037 @@@bundle branch blocks@@@ were observed in four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@; one subject with a baseline first-degree @<m>DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@atrioventricular block@@@ developed symptomatic @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradyarrhythmia@@@ while receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Gianotti N, Guffanti M, Galli L, Margonato A, Chiaravalli G, Bigoloni A, Lazzarin A, Castagna A. Electrocardiographic changes in HIV-infected, drug-experienced patients being treated with atazanavir. AIDS. 2007 Jul 31;21(12):1648-51. PMID: 17630564
